# grafana-sunburst-panel

The sunburst panel is a more powerful pie chart.
It can contain nested group data.


## Formats of data source

| Data source          | TimeSeries | Table | Docs |
|:---------------------|:----------:|:-----:|:----:|
| ElasticSearch        | OK         | --    | OK   |
| InfluxDB             | OK         | OK    | --   |
| Sqldb (not released) | OK         | OK    | OK   |
